content.raw:
It works for me. Just two comments:

When you select an object, copy it, and press `CTRL-V` you can poke around with the position where the new object will be placed if you click with the mouse. There's no way to abort the operation at this point. I would expect to abort it if you press `ESC` or click on a different widget button.

If I'm in the previous situation with the copied model ready to be placed after a mouse click and you press `CTRL-V` a second time, the model is pasted. Is this on purpose?
content.html:
It works for me. Just two comments:

When you select an object, copy it, and press CTRL-V you can poke around with the position where the new object will be placed if you click with the mouse. There's no way to abort the operation at this point. I would expect to abort it if you press ESC or click on a different widget button.

If I'm in the previous situation with the copied model ready to be placed after a mouse click and you press CTRL-V a second time, the model is pasted. Is this on purpose?
